mScripts.name: Normal service
mScripts.description: Contains the steps necessary for recording and publishing a normal service.

mLeftInputLevelProperty.description: Displays the current left input level as a value between 0 and 100. Displays the current right input level as a value between 0 and 100. If the dBFS scale is used, the 100 represents 0dBFS and 0 represents -50dBFS. Otherwise it represents the (scaled) raw readings.

mUseDbProperty.description: Specifies whether the meters should show the signal readings in dBFS (logarithmic) or raw (linear). For an explanation of dBFS, please refer to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DBFS.

mHeadroomProperty.description: Specifies the headroom in dBFS. This must be a number between 0 and 18. For an explanation of the headroom please refer to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Headroom. For an explanation of dBFS, please refer to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DBFS.

mUseDbProperty.description: Specifies whether the meters should show the signal readings in dBFS (logarithmic) or raw (linear). For an explanation of dBFS, please refer to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DBFS.

mHeadroomProperty.description: Specifies the headroom in dBFS. This must be a number between 0 and 18. For an explanation of the headroom please refer to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Headroom. For an explanation of dBFS, please refer to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DBFS.

mHeadroomProperty.description: Specifies the headroom in dBFS. This must be a number between 0 and 18. For an explanation of the headroom please refer to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Headroom. For an explanation of dBFS, please refer to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DBFS.

mHeadroomProperty.description: Specifies the headroom in dBFS. This must be a number between 0 and 18. For an explanation of the headroom please refer to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Headroom. For an explanation of dBFS, please refer to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DBFS.

mSteps.name: Convert sermon recording to MP3
mSteps.description: Converts a WAVE file to MP3 format using the MP3 encoder.
mSteps.titleParameter: The love of God - John 3:16 on 17 Sep 2006

mMp3FolderReferenceParameter.description: Specifies a reference to the folder where the new MP3 entry should be stored.

mMp3EntryReferenceResult.description: Contains a reference to the MP3 entry that has been converted.

mSteps.commentParameter: Everything went marvelous. Where can I buy this software?
mSteps.subjectParameter: DMS log of AM service on 17 Sep 2006

mScripts.name: WordWiseXtra meeting
mScripts.description: Contains the steps necessary for recording and publishing a WordWiseXtra meeting.

mSteps.description: Please make sure that there is enough disk space free on this computer. There must be at least 1 GB (i.e. 1024 MB) available for the recordings. If not enough disk space is available, please delete the oldest recordings till enough disk space is free.

mUseDbProperty.description: Specifies whether the meters should show the signal readings in dBFS (logarithmic) or raw (linear). For an explanation of dBFS, please refer to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DBFS.

mHeadroomProperty.description: Specifies the headroom in dBFS. This must be a number between 0 and 18. For an explanation of the headroom please refer to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Headroom. For an explanation of dBFS, please refer to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DBFS.

mUseDbProperty.description: Specifies whether the meters should show the signal readings in dBFS (logarithmic) or raw (linear). For an explanation of dBFS, please refer to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DBFS.

mHeadroomProperty.description: Specifies the headroom in dBFS. This must be a number between 0 and 18. For an explanation of the headroom please refer to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Headroom. For an explanation of dBFS, please refer to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DBFS.

mUseDbProperty.description: Specifies whether the meters should show the signal readings in dBFS (logarithmic) or raw (linear). For an explanation of dBFS, please refer to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DBFS.

mHeadroomProperty.description: Specifies the headroom in dBFS. This must be a number between 0 and 18. For an explanation of the headroom please refer to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Headroom. For an explanation of dBFS, please refer to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DBFS.

mSteps.name: Convert first part WordWiseXtra to MP3
mSteps.description: Converts the WordWiseXtra talk from WAVE to MP3 format using the LAME encoder. Note: This converter uses average bit rate (ABR) encoding and not CBR or VBR.

mMp3FolderReferenceParameter.description: Specifies a reference to the folder where the new MP3 entry should be stored.

mMp3EntryReferenceResult.description: Contains a reference to the MP3 entry that has been converted.

mSteps.name: Convert second part of WordWiseXtra to MP3
mSteps.description: Converts the WordWiseXtra Q&A from WAVE to MP3 format using the LAME encoder. Note: This converter uses average bit rate (ABR) encoding and not CBR or VBR.

mMp3FolderReferenceParameter.description: Specifies a reference to the folder where the new MP3 entry should be stored.

mMp3EntryReferenceResult.description: Contains a reference to the MP3 entry that has been converted.

mSteps.commentParameter: So long and thanks for all the fish.
Everything went marvelous. Where can I buy this software?

mSteps.name: Update published sermon web page and MP3s
Update published WWX web page and MP3s
